android.car.drivingstate

类 CarDrivingStateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.drivingstate.CarDrivingStateManager

  • public final class CarDrivingStateManager
extends CarManagerBase
    API to register and get driving state related information in a car.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  CarDrivingStateManager.CarDrivingStateEventListener
      Listener Interface for clients to implement to get updated on driving state changes.

    • 字段概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(CarDrivingStateManager.CarDrivingStateEventListener listener)
        Register a CarDrivingStateManager.CarDrivingStateEventListener to listen for driving state changes.
        参数:
        listener - CarDrivingStateManager.CarDrivingStateEventListener

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener()
        Unregister the registered CarDrivingStateManager.CarDrivingStateEventListener for the given driving event type.

      • getCurrentCarDrivingState

        public CarDrivingStateEvent getCurrentCarDrivingState()
        Get the current value of the car's driving state.
        返回:
        CarDrivingStateEvent corresponding to the given eventType

      • injectDrivingState

        public void injectDrivingState(int drivingState)
        Notify registered driving state change listener about injected event. Requires Permission: Car.PERMISSION_CONTROL_APP_BLOCKING
        参数:
        drivingState - Value in CarDrivingStateEvent.CarDrivingState.
